definition: a scheme or set of strategies for conducting a business campaign or a political campaign
details:
noun
- a scheme or set of strategies for conducting a business campaign or a political campaign
= example: a scheme or set of strategies for conducting a business campaign or a political campaign
- a book containing the scripts of one or more dramatic plays
= example: a book containing the scripts of one or more dramatic plays
- a notebook containing descriptions and diagrams of the plays that a team has practiced (especially an American football team)
